paper.title: Correlation based hierarchical clustering in financial time series
paper.abstract: We review a correlation based clustering procedure applied to a portfolio of assets synchronously traded in a financial market. The portfolio considered consists of the set of 500 highly capitalized stocks traded at the New York Stock Exchange during the time period 1987-1998. We show that meaningful economic information can be extracted from correlation matrices.

domain_result.justification: 该论文研究了基于相关性的层次聚类方法在资产组合中的应用，旨在从相关性矩阵中提取有意义的经济信息，这直接关联到投资组合管理的领域。
